General.Name: S.P.I Landscape Design Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Guangzhou S.P.I Design Co., Ltd. engages in landscape design business. The company engages in the urban and rural development, and the construction of ecological civilization projects. It develops Shanshui Community, Shanshui cultural tourism, and Shanshui city. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
